Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
It is time to control your air conditioners and heat pumps using simple voice commands. Smart Controller lets you control your air conditioners and heat pumps smartly. In combination with Alexa, you have even more flexibility and control. Using Smart Controller with Alexa is simple, convenient, and fun. It saves you energy and reduces your electricity bills for air conditioners. “SmartHVAC” our Smart Home Skill for Alexa gives you flexibility and convenience to communicate with Alexa – e.g. now you can ask Alexa to set the temperature of your air conditioner as per your choice, change power settings, and more.

Need Help?
Please visit the website of Cielo WiGle and select ‘Support’ or directly visit https://cielosupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us. We are available to help from 9 am-9 pm EST (Mon-Fri).
The variation of temperature commands that work for you depends on the AC model that is configured for the Smart Controller. In case of any issues, please contact us at https://www.cielowigle.com/contact-us/

While you configure Alexa with SmartHVAC, you will need:
1. Smart Controller enabled air conditioner.
2. ‘SmartHVAC’ app available for Android and iOS platforms.
3. SmartHVAC account – can be created using ‘SmartHVAC’ app.
4. Registered Smart Controller for your air conditioner using ‘SmartHVAC’ app.

How to Control using Amazon Alexa:
1. You will need a Smart Controller connected to the internet.
2. An air conditioner for which you have already configured Smart Controller through “SmartHVAC” app.

How to setup SmartHVAC Skill:
To get started, select the Enable Skill button in the “Alexa App”. 
Link "SmartHVAC" skill with Alexa through “SmartHVAC” app.
As you complete this step, you are all set to control your air conditioners/heat pumps with simple commands. Below are a few sample commands:
Please note, in all commands “Bedroom” is assumed as the "name of your Smart Controller” in SmartHVAC App. If you have a different name, please use that one for your voice commands.

Power on/off:
Alexa, turn on the Bedroom. 
Alexa, turn off the Bedroom. 

Know your current room temperature:
Alexa, what is the temperature of Bedroom? 

Know your current set point temperature or mode:
Alexa, what is Bedroom set to? 

Setting the temperature:
Alexa, set Bedroom temperature to 72. 
OR
Alexa, set Bedroom temperature to 72 degrees. 

Increasing the temperature:
Alexa, make Bedroom warmer. 
OR
Alexa, increase Bedroom temperature. 
OR
Alexa, increase Bedroom temperature by 2 degrees. 

Decreasing the temperature:
Alexa, make Bedroom cooler. 
OR
Alexa, decrease Bedroom temperature. 
OR
Alexa, decrease Bedroom temperature by 2 degrees. 

Changing mode:
Alexa, set Bedroom to Heat. 
Note: Alexa only supports Heat, Cool and Auto modes.

Setting Away, Home comfort settings:
You may configure ‘Home’ and ‘Away’ settings through Alexa routines and then use for your Smart Controller using Alexa voice commands as: 
“Alexa, I am home.”
“Alexa, good night.”

If you need more help, please visit the website of Cielo WiGle and select ‘Support’ or directly visit https://cielosupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us. We are available to help from 9 am-9 pm EST (Mon-Fri)
